name: Grilled Aubergines with Prosciutto
author: Eshka
summary: A deliciously healthy and alternative salad - a great way to get your vegetables!
ingredients: 1  eggplant, ends trimmed and cut into 1/2-inch-thick slices
1  red bell pepper, cut into rings and seeds removed
1 cup spinach leaves, torn into pieces
1 (1/2 ounce) slice  thinly sliced prosciutto di Parma
freshly ground rock salt to taste
directions: Preheat your oven's broiler to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Arrange slices of eggplant and red bell pepper on a baking sheet
Broil for about 7 minutes, until soft
Meanwhile, place the spinach onto a serving plate and drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar
When the vegetables are done, arrange the red peppers over the spinach
Smear a small amount of sun-dried tomato paste onto each slice of eggplant
Top with a slice of prosciutto
Arrange the eggplant slices over the peppers in an overlapping spiral pattern
